abstract: The loss was bigger than expected, hurt by slower sales and a bruising price war with its larger rival, Intel.
snippet: The loss was bigger than expected, hurt by slower sales and a bruising price war with its larger rival, Intel.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, April 19 — After a three-year run, Advanced Micro Devices is back on the defensive.

headline.main: Price War Takes Toll as A.M.D. Posts Loss
headline.print_headline: Price War Takes Toll As A.M.D. Posts Loss
